column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////If you like things spicy
column2: I recommend the Jinya Tonkotsu Black
column3: tell them to make it HOT
column4: add lots of garlic and I prefer the THICK noodles to the THIN - it was so delicious!   We also got the Spicy Miso Ramen
column6: but not as good as the Tonkotsu  -- the ground pork just wasn't as good as the pork chashu.
